name: RETOOLED
description:
Forged to challenge your skills in a fast, fluid movement shooter. While facing a rogue AI and hordes of robots in a single player story. Fight in increasingly complex arenas while continuously expanding your arsenal.

Your story begins…


Bunnyhop your way into fast paced action that demands the use of all your arsenal and abilities. Fight through arenas designed to take full advantage of the player movement system and enemy capabilities.



Face a diverse and dynamic enemy lineup, designed to react to your actions and put your skills to the test. RETOOLED is meant to be challenging and will give you, when or if conquered, a sense of accomplishment.
